create.title: Create a round
create.retakeRoundHint: Retake rounds must be created immediately after the main round. Please plan your round creation order accordingly.

errors.bufferError: Round start must be after previous round buffer. Earliest allowed: {{date}}.
errors.conflictError: Round dates conflict with existing round '{{roundName}}' ({{startDate}} - {{endDate}}).
errors.roundAlreadyEnded: Round already ended. Cannot start now.
errors.previousRoundNotFinalized: Cannot start round '{{currentRound}}' because previous round '{{previousRound}}' is not finalized.
errors.retakeRoundPlacement: Retake round must be the immediate next round after its main round (no rounds in between).
errors.startBeforeContest: Cannot start round before contest start.
errors.endBeforeStart: Cannot end round before it starts.
errors.fastForwardAppealSubmitBeforeRoundStart: Cannot fast-forward appeal submit before round starts.
errors.fastForwardAppealReviewBeforeRoundStart: Cannot fast-forward appeal review before round starts.
errors.finalizeBeforeDeadlines: Finalize is only allowed after all deadlines are completed.
errors.judgeDeadlineBeforeRoundEnd: Judge deadline cannot be before round end.

actions.roundControlDesc: Start or end the round immediately
